area.key: Welcome to a new episode of Jackass
Static Site Generator is not enabled. Set the web.config key to true
These should be fine to go with by default. Please make sure you know what you're doing if you change anything!
The root folder of the website
By default: 'website'. Change this if the rootnode of your website in Umbraco has a different name then website.
In this folder you store the 301.html (see below)
The filename of the 301-file in templates
In the template-folder, what is the name of your 301-file (by default 301.html). Don't change unless you know why.
This is the file that's put in a folder to recognize a 301-redirect, without needing to read the HTML-file
The output-folder of your HTML-files. By default it's www.
